SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_.*,ROWNUM ROWNUM_ FROM ( select t.*,bci.chinese_name,pa.product_name from local_excel t left join BASIC_CUSTOMER_INFORMATION bci on t.customer_id = bci.id left join PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE pa on t.product_id = pa.id where product_id=#{productId} and customer_id=#{customerId}
) ROW_ WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit}*#{page} + #{limit}) WHERE ROWNUM_ > #{limit}*#{page}
select t.* from local_excel t where id=#{id}

select id, application_id as applicationId, customer_id as customerId, product_id as productId, sheet_jy as sheetJy, sheet_jjbs as sheetJjbs, sheet_jbzk as sheetJbzk, sheet_jyzt as sheetJyzt, sheet_sczt as sheetSczt, sheet_ddpz as sheetDdpz, sheet_fz as sheetFz, sheet_lrjb as sheetLrjb, sheet_bzlrb as sheetBzlrb, sheet_xjllb as sheetXjllb, sheet_jc as sheetJc, sheet_dhd as sheetDhd, sheet_gdzc as sheetGdzc, sheet_yfys as sheetYfys, sheet_ysyf as sheetYsyf, sheet_lsfx as sheetLsfx
from local_excel where application_id=#{applicationId}
